sql.up: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS friend_requests (id serial PRIMARY KEY, sender_id text NOT NULL, receiver_id text NOT NULL, message text, status text DEFAULT 'pending', created_at timestamptz DEFAULT now(), updated_at timestamptz DEFAULT now(), CONSTRAINT chk_different_request_users CHECK (sender_id <> receiver_id), CONSTRAINT unq_pending_request UNIQUE (sender_id, receiver_id))
